title: Raspberry panna cotta with doughnuts
description: Light, creamy panna cotta served with mini doughnuts and a raspberry sauce.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need 10 dariole moulds.
ingredients: 10 sheets gelatine, soaked in cold water for 5 minutes
1 litre/1¾ pint vegetable oil, for deep frying, plus extra for greasing
200g/7oz caster sugar, to coat the doughnuts
raspberries and mint leaves, to decorate
